predicate.note: Frames file for 'underperform' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to perform not as well as smth else

example.name: transitive with adverbials
example.text: But while the merits of diversification shine through when times are tough, there's also a price to pay: A diversified portfolio always underperforms an undiversified portfolio during those times when the investment in the undiversified portfolio is truly hot.
example.arg: during those times when the investment in the undiversified portfolio is truly hot
